root.name: Bigfoot
root.description: Bigfoot is a simple 1-2 player monster truck racing game for the NES. Races take place in 2 forms, an over the top view with game play is similar to Super Off Road and a side scrolling mode. The second mode you are challenged to beat the other truck with out damaging your own to the point of it breaking down. As you continually compete in events across the United States you earn money which is spent on repairs and upgrades.
